img_above_text:
# Rat Sage Staff
The Rat Sage Staff Staff is an Epic weapon in Black Myth: Wukong. It comes with solid stats, damage, and a decent, albeit easily outbeaten unique effect compared to the other Weapons in the game.
The weapon comes with a respectable 66 damage, and the unique effect of making the fourth move of a light attack combo and the mobile staff spin stir up a whirlwind of sands, increasing attack range and damage.

img_summary: The image displays the Rat Sage Staff, an Epic weapon in the game Black Myth: Wukong. The staff has an attack power of 66 and a critical hit chance of 7%. Its unique effect enhances the fourth move of a light attack combo and the mobile staff spin, creating a whirlwind of sands that increases attack range and damage. The image serves to illustrate the weapon's stats and special abilities as described in the preceding text.
